Campaigns.name: Fear the Night
Campaigns.story:
Godfather ipsum dolor sit amet. It's a Sicilian message. It means Luca Brasi sleeps with the fishes. You can act like a man! Don't ever give an order like that again. Not while I'm alive. Mr Corleone is Johnny Fontane's godfather. Now Italians regard that as a very close, a very sacred religious relationship.

Only don't tell me you're innocent. Because it insults my intelligence and makes me very angry. I'm your older brother, Mike, and I was stepped over! I see you took the name of the town. What was your father's name? Leave the gun. Take the cannoli.

Never let anyone know what you are thinking. Vito, how do you like my little angel? Isn't she beautiful? Just when I thought I was out... they pull me back in. Your enemies always get strong on what you leave behind. What's the matter with you? Is this what you've become, a Hollywood finocchio who cries like a woman? "Oh, what do I do? What do I do?" What is that nonsense? Ridiculous!

Michael, you never told me you knew Johnny Fontane! Never hate your enemies. It affects your judgment. Is that why you slapped my brother around in public? Hey, listen, I want somebody good - and I mean very good - to plant that gun. I don't want my brother coming out of that toilet with just his dick in his hands, alright? Don Corleone, I am honored and grateful that you have invited me to your home on the wedding day of your daughter. And may their first child be a masculine child.

Campaigns.name: Down the well
Campaigns.story:
Godfather ipsum dolor sit amet. Never hate your enemies. It affects your judgment. Very well. You want to do business with me. I will do business with you. It's not personal. It's business. Just when I thought I was out... they pull me back in.

This one time, this one time I'll let you ask me about my affairs. Don't you know that I would use all of my power to prevent something like that from happening? Sonny, please don't do anything. Please don't do anything. What's wrong with being a lawyer?

I want your answer and the money by noon tomorrow. And one more thing. Don't you contact me again, ever. From now on, you deal with Turnbull. Don Corleone, I am honored and grateful that you have invited me to your home on the wedding day of your daughter. And may their first child be a masculine child. When they come... they come at what you love. In Sicily, women are more dangerous than shotguns. Don't ever give an order like that again. Not while I'm alive.

Campaigns.name: The big ol world
Campaigns.story:
Godfather ipsum dolor sit amet. Why do you hurt me, Michael? I've always been loyal to you. We're both part of the same hypocrisy, senator, but never think it applies to my family. Is that why you slapped my brother around in public? Mr Corleone is Johnny Fontane's godfather. Now Italians regard that as a very close, a very sacred religious relationship. Sonny, please don't do anything. Please don't do anything.

I want your answer and the money by noon tomorrow. And one more thing. Don't you contact me again, ever. From now on, you deal with Turnbull. If anything in this life is certain, if history has taught us anything, it is that you can kill anyone. Fredo, you're my older brother, and I love you. But don't ever take sides with anyone against the Family again. Ever. What's the matter with you? Is this what you've become, a Hollywood finocchio who cries like a woman? "Oh, what do I do? What do I do?" What is that nonsense? Ridiculous!

What's wrong with being a lawyer? I see you took the name of the town. What was your father's name? I don't trust a doctor who can hardly speak English. I am sorry. What happened to your father was business. I have much respect for your father. But your father, his thinking is old-fashioned. You must understand why I had to do that. Now let's work through where we go from here.

I'm your older brother, Mike, and I was stepped over! Only don't tell me you're innocent. Because it insults my intelligence and makes me very angry. Do me this favor. I won't forget it. Ask your friends in the neighborhood about me. They'll tell you I know how to return a favor. You talk about vengeance. Is vengeance going to bring your son back to you? Or my boy to me? That's my family Kay, that's not me.

Campaigns.name: The Journey Home
Campaigns.story:
Thunder cracks over head illuminating the road in front of you. You see the deep ruts where wagons have crossed for trade begin to fill with muddy water from the rain. Coming face on is a carriage drawn by two massive horses. A lantern is suspended over the carriage giving some light on the driver, which from this distance looks to be a pile of furs drenched to the bone. As you draw near the driver speaks up.

"grun'n":Hello there traveler need any wares?

As you get close you feel a strange presence emanating from him. Its not evil but simply uncertain. 

(if conversation is initiated he will speak about his wares and how he is a travelling merchant. After a bit of conversation and possibly some purchases he will offer to accompany you to your destination. DC 15 to spot a necklace he wears called the pendant of fate. if the player notices and comments on the necklace Grun'n will pull it out smile softly and say)

"grun'n": ay this old thing came to me in a vision it is what leads me and something in it is telling me to follow you.

The newly formed group moves off in a singular direction. two more hours pass before the long road finally catches up to you and you feel the call for rest. 

During your sleep a dream comes to you.The same dream you have had your entire life. It shows a wide and barren plane with weapons strewn everywhere dead bodies litter the field and in the middle of it all sits a black tower. Its material is so dark that the very outline of the tower fades into the night sky. A sudden bright light shines everywhere casting all the shadows away. in the center of the light you can feel a source of immense power.Just as suddenly as it all started it ends. you wake up drenched in sweat shivering.(if the player left without Grun'n he will be by the fire and start speaking instantly begin speaking) Grun'n sits by the fire and looks up while holding the strange rock that is on his necklace. 

"grun'n" : So you are cursed with dreams. If you dont mind my asking what sort of dreams do you have.

after the decision is made to tell grun'n he will respond with either

(you told him): *he nods slowly* tis an uncertain omen but it will at least reinforce my certainty of following you.*he nods to himself and seems to fall asleep in his beard*.

(you didnt  tell him):*he grunts* i understand, its no business of mine.*he nods to himself and seems to fall asleep in his beard*.

You wake up early the rain died during the night but everything is still damp. The embers of the fire slowly sizzle as the last of the heat leaves them. The day is brighter than yesterdays and the sun is just starting to peak through the trees. Grun'n is up and eating an apple.

"grun'n": Oh yer up good here have one *he offers an apple* the roads are starting to dry up which will be good for travel *he nods to the road* now do you know where yer going?

You do its only a fading memory though. You have been seeking an ancient ruin buried thousands of feet under the ground. In the ruins is a citadel ran by duregar who are ruled over by and evil mindflayer.

Grun'n:   *does not break eye contact but you see his knuckels turn white as he grips the apple even tighter early causing it to burst* Ive heard of such ruins but to get to them you will need to be allowed access to the ancient crypts of the dwarven kingdom located inside of FiresBane Mountain. It is a long way to travel but... but i will join you if you let me.

1 days travel to the next town of Leebrun 

during the day the ride is mostly uneventful. 2 encounters

about 3 hours into travel the group will come across a woman sitting by the road crying into her dress.

"lady":Oh heavens please help me they have taken everything and left me with not even my children please help me.

if they pass the lady will curse at them and let them go.

if they stop the lady begins to laugh as 2 bowmen jump out of the bushes aiming bows at them.

"thief#1": Now what do we have here.

"thief#2": looks like a good samaritan stopped and got themselves into a trap"

"lady": *pulls an unseen dagger* drop the weapons and give us whatever you have.

After the fight grun'n will say a prayer and get back on the carriage. 

"Grun'n": sorry folk cant even get enough to survive they resort to highway robbery. a true shame.

after a few more hours you come across a beautiful spring with small lights dancing over head.

"grun'n": by the gods what is this. i have traveled this road many times and have never seen this. What should we do.

(perception check of 12 will reveal that the lights are will-o-wisps)

if they choose to explore they will find that the water is cool and soothing. At the bottom of the pool is a sword (can be spotted with a 15 perception check).takes 2 athletics checks to swim to 10,12 then a strength check of 15 to pull the sword. Once the sword has been pulled the wanderer will fall unconscious and have another dream. in this dream the wanderer will see all the previous wielders of the sword with a black figure standing in the middle the figures will slowly step away and the wanderer will wake up sputtering couphing up water with Grun'n standing over her yelling her name.

"grun'n": Wake up (name) WAKE UP. oh good you are alive what the hell happend there you swam under and then floated back to the top.

After wrapping that situation up the group has another six hours of uneventful travel before they reach the town of Leebrun.

Occupants of Leebrun

smithy- elf - Levandar- Tack n Trade- basic equipment for sale no magic- a tall well built elf with jet black hair in a pony tail. wearing a leather smock over basic clothes.
if you bring the sword to the elf he will be amazed at the craftsmanship and says that the only time he has seen this sort of smithing was an ancient relics from the time of the magma dwarves.

innkeeper- human - bill - Restawhile - food supplies rooms
constible- human - Sir FoxWood
Medium height sturdy built gray hair with a thick mustache. hates goblins and is super suspicious of burst/spurt tasks the player with following them around and see what they are up to. After finding out about the secret goblin clan that burst/spurt are keeping off by giving them equipment for free. Sir FoxWood will ask the group to take them on and get rid of the pests.

priest - halfling - Father mulgrim - church of Lathander - holy atonement
very short very old blind in both eyes completely bald .will offer help with your soul and if you purchase the holy atonement he will speak on your story and tell you what path you are following

level up

oddities shop - troll/goblin - burst/spurt - TRDE - mostly junk but with a 16 perception check will find an old book that fascinates Grun'n 
after being asked to follow the pair of misfits after dark.(dc 12 perception) they will see the pair leave the hut after dark and starts heading back into the woods. (dc 16 perception) either you get ambushed or you spot them either way 3 goblin scouts will attack.

Once the ambush has been dealt with, it will take n extra 30 mins of travel to find the site (dc 15 perception). inside the camp will be 4 more goblins around a fire talking to burst/spurt 

"goblin#1": WE ASKED FOR THE SHARP STICKS and you bring us DULL WHACKeMs 

"goblin#2": Maybe they want us to die when we raid

"gobln#1": EVIL TRAtORS DIE are youa traitor

"spurt": NONONO whys would we betray you, you are of our blood. Come on guys ill bring you the good stuff next time just take it and please dont raid my village anymore i need them to sell my wares.

after the party decides what to do they either talk to sir FoxWood or attack the camp. Sir FoxWood will ask you to take care of the camp for a reward. if you speak to the duo before Sir FoxWood he will plead with them to report nothing as these goblins arent attacking this town only because he is giving them loot. With enough convincing you can get him to give you a discount for taking out the camp and not turning him in. Sir FoxWood will give you 200 gold for taking care of the camp and an extra 50 gold if you find a link between the goblins and Burst/Spurt.

after several days in town Grun'n will complain that you arent moving enough and if your dreams mean anything we should probably get going. the town has 2 exits either take the road out of town and head towards The Cauldron a large dip in the plains that keeps heat trapped in but is home to a strangely heat resistant breed of hill dwarves. Or you can leave on a boat for 50(gp) the boat will take you up river to the logging town of FellingGon. 

2 days by boat to FellingGon
4 days walking to The Cauldron
END OF SESSION 1

The Town of FellinGon

lumber master - dwarf - toth MarrowDrinker
a sturdy dwarf with thick calloused hands a short beard and a single long brown braid. the lumber master will be very disgruntled as his operations are being interrupted. He will ask you to solve this problem for him. He has a giant spider who has moved into a part of his cutting grounds and has been killing any lumberjacks that get close he will pay you 125 gp, or recommend you to the thieves guild   

lawkeeper - elf - belivon 
seems to think that nothing here goes wrong and this is a nice lawful town. 

Innkeeper - human - Grahm milgid
She is an old woman with gray hair who is very kind (runs a front for a secret bar on the 1st floor). to get in you need a recomendation from Toth. she sells food, drink, and has rooms.

magic shop- drow - Elithes salavar
dark skin thin and tall, elegant dress with a high collar. White hair with dark eyes. (member of a secret cult bent on finding the fated one to bring in the darkness.)will be very interested in the player. (Grun'n will not like her). if the player wishes she can become the players companion but grun'n will leave. must have shown the sword and talked about her dreams to get this.

smithy- human - Brawn newson
man well in his 60s large belly strong arms sells standard gear. Knows about the thieves guild and is about to turn them in.

alchemist- tabaxi - grims petrovan
7 foot tabaxi black fur. works with the thieves guild makes poisons for them. will sell items at a discounted price once you are a part of the thieves guild. sells first and second level potions and can make many potions that you want. 

priest- human -  father anthony
a middle age man with white hair a calm expression on his face. if you come in with grun'n he will be pleased and hopes you will stay on this path. he will also help you with the dreams by giving you a ring with a small inscription on it of a dead language. the ring will bring you comfort is all he says. if you come in with elithes he will be disappointed and say he sees darkness in your path and warns you to be careful. after you leave elithes will comment on how that prattling dolt has no clue what your potential is. 

thieves guild den leader- gnome - overseer kiln
a thin gnome with a long nose and black curly mustache. no hair but wears a fancy hat. he will be impressed that you killed a giant spider and will offer you a place in the thieves guild only if you can get a poison from grims and poisoning brawn newson. once you join the thieves guild you will be granted the discount and gain leeway in many big cities/towns with the right guards. he will tell you that the guards under the thieves guilds control all wear a red pin on there boots so just look out for friendly footwear. 

7 days of travel wolves on first day. cart on third. temple on sixth. 

Temple
head priest- human - The seer - secret lich
The seer will send you on a quest to find the sister temple and reclaim it as a band of clerics have taken it over. The temple is located 4 days east of this temple Elithes will show you the way. FINISH IF CHOICE IS MADE

City Of Gall

head guard - Bord Nelgin - half orc
A tall strong orc with light green skin a shaved head and very small tusks poking through his lips.he is a part of the thieves guild. If you are a part he will offer you info on good spots to hit and where to find fences. If you are not a thief he will simply say to move along and not offer anything.

High priest - Father Mashk - elf
A very old elf, carrys himself gracefully. Tall stands straight, long white hair finely brushed and behind his back. His eyes are pure white, and has several small tattoos framing the face. Is a very busy man who will not have time to speak unless Priestess Vantil sends you to him. If you are sent by her he will offer you a job to reinforce the local clerics that have taken over an evil temple.

priestess - Priestess Vantil - human
She is a medium height woman with brown hair kept in a bun. she wears a plain dress with the symbol of her god on it. she will tell you that the temple needs help and to talk to Father Mashk about it.

grand duke - Grand Duke Armond Voltaire - Dwarf
alchemy shop - Bip dipperdo - gnome
magic shop - Pib dipperdo - gnome
Smithy - Bone - Fire Giant
General goods - Bill bowman - Human
grand library - Keeper Trenal - Drow
Stronghold of clerics - Father Rune - Dwarf
inn - Krees bonin - half elf
inn -  Nugun - Dwarf
Jail - Norden Valls - Dwarf
